sentences.en: At any rate, Catherine, destitute of cash and friends, cannot disturb his possession.
sentences.cn: 毕竟, 凯瑟琳无钱无势, 是不能干预他的产权的.

sentences.en: He got congress to appropriate $ 25 million to resettle destitute families on farms.
sentences.cn: 他叫国会拨款二千五百万美元在农村安置贫困的家庭.

sentences.en: His mind was destitute of that dread.
sentences.cn: 他的头脑里不再有那种恐惧感.

sentences.en: I had liv'd a dreadful life, perfectly destitute of the knowledge and fear of god.
sentences.cn: 过去,我过着可怕的生活, 对上帝完全缺乏认识和敬畏.

sentences.en: It was not quite destitute of furniture.
Many had lost all in the disaster and were destitute.
sentences.cn: 很多人被灾难夺去了一切，变得一无所有。

sentences.en: The floods left many people destitute .
sentences.cn: 这场洪水使许多人变得一无所有。

sentences.en: The people were homeless at that time, are destitute and homeless.
sentences.cn: 那时人们无家可归, 流离失所.

sentences.en: The recollection of your sister's destitute condition determined me on an effort to save my life.
sentences.cn: 想到你妹妹的难堪的情况,我就下决心要保住性命.

sentences.en: The symptoms of a country destitute of water gave food for reflection to Dr. Fergusson.
sentences.cn: 这干旱的种种征兆更加重了费尔久逊博士的心事.

sentences.en: They are destitute of common sense.
They are not destitute that they need your help.
sentences.cn: 他们并不是贫穷的需要你的帮助.

sentences.en: They were destitute of necessaries of life.
When he died, his family was left completely destitute.
When he died, his family was left destitute.
When Mr. Smith died, his wife and childern were left destitute.
sentences.cn: 史密斯先生死后, 他的妻儿变得一贫如洗.

trans.tran_cn: 极度缺乏的，贫乏的，穷困的，无的
trans.tran_en: having no money, no food, no home etc
